<NEW>

Rodimus looked at the others=
 as they talked, his optics revealing very
little of the inner turmoil that=
 was inside. He was about to go up
against the best that had caught him and=
 turned him into a monster.

His optics hardened as he nodded, =93I will go=
.=94 He said with a finality
in his words. =93Hydras deserves to be paid ba=
ck for what he did to me.=94

<NEW>

Rodimus nodded at Kup,=
 a fleeting smile flashed across his face, =93I
can think of no better frie=
nd to have at my back then you.=94 He said,
his face reflecting the thanks =
he felt.

He turned to Windlord, =93Are you sure you are ready to go up aga=
inst
Hydras, he has done much to you as well, turned you inside and out. It=
